messages.subject: Thanks/sorry
messages.msgSnippet: Hi folks, Sorry for the Moistursil add and story.  I was surprized to see it, must have accidentally clicked on Unschooling when sending it to Tiffany.  I
messages.messageBody:
Hi folks,

Sorry for the Moistursil "add" and story. I was surprized to see it,
must have accidentally clicked on Unschooling when sending it to
Tiffany. I must make a point of reading one Unschooling a day. It
always gives me good ideas. I especially liked the one from the person
with the six year old, I'm going to check into Mad Libs. I've been
noticing his progression in letter, words and numbers.

Heres a story about numbers. We were taking a bath. He tells me I
really don't know Math that well. I tell him we have 5 minutes left in
our bath. Then I tell him in a bit that 2 minutes have gone by and we
have to get out soon. He says no, we don't have to get out soon we have
3 minutes left. (he did this in his head). He's doing fine. I use
this story when folks ask how he is doing.

Thanks,
Sherry
